name: Nuisance may be enjoined, abated
text:
§145-11  Nuisance may be enjoined, abated.  Violation of this chapter is declared a public nuisance and may be enjoined or abated in like manner as other public nuisances. [L 1951, c 74, pt of §1; RL 1955, §23-11; HRS §145-11]
 
Rules of Court
 
  Injunction, see HRCP rule 65.
